location.title: Location
location.venueDescription: Located in the heart of the city, our venue offers a perfect blend of elegance and accessibility. The Grand Exhibition Hall features state-of-the-art facilities with stunning architecture.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What is the Champagne Festival about?
faq.a1: The Champagne Festival is a celebration of fine champagne, bringing together producers, enthusiasts, and the community for tastings, workshops, and social events.
faq.a2: The next festival is scheduled for {festivalDateRange}. Mark your calendars for a weekend of bubbles and festivities!
faq.q3: Where will the festival be held?
faq.a3: The festival will take place at the Grand Exhibition Hall in the city center. There's convenient public transportation and parking nearby.
faq.a4: Early bird tickets will be available starting September 2024. Sign up for our newsletter to be notified when tickets go on sale.
faq.q5: Can I become a sponsor or vendor?
faq.a5: Yes! We welcome partnerships with businesses related to champagne, food, and luxury lifestyle. Please use our contact form to express your interest.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website or services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
